1261050.name: Pillars of Dust OST
1261050.description: The Pillars of Dust OST is now available for download! Featuring over 37 tracks of chiptune glory, this soundtrack hearkens back to the glory days of bleeps and boops with aplomb. Listen to the tunes that accompany Carlton and Gregg as they venture across the mysterious land of Alluriga. This package includes both MP3 and lossless audio for your listening pleasure.
